attributes.action: Abolish the BBC TV license fee and replace it with ads or subscription
attributes.additional_details: We want the TV license in the UK abolished, it's outdated not fit for purpose and it's totally unfair to force the British public into paying for something they do not want! The BBC can be funded in other ways such as advertisements or a monthly subscription like others are or a combination of both, sending people to people's homes to ask about TV license is intimidating and shameful and sending people to prison even more so if they do not have a license! People should have a choice.
attributes.background: We the public want the TV license to be scrapped so we want the government to scrap the TV license fees.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
